name: SMPspectator
description: Allows players to toggle between Spectator and Survival mode using /s.

smpspectator.*.description: Gives access to all SMPspectator commands.

smpspectator.use.description: Allows using the /s command to toggle spectator mode.

smpspectator.enable.description: Allows enabling of all SMPspectator commands.

smpspectator.speed.description: Allows changing fly speed in spectator mode.

smpspectator.effect.description: Allows night vision in spectator mode.

smpspectator.force.description: Allows forcing other players into and out of spectator mode.
